verbs.description: Cambridge Analytica , [ARG0: the political ad marketing firm] [R-ARG0: that] [V: worked] [ARG2: for President Trump] and was involved in the misappropriation of 87 million Facebook users ' data , is reportedly closing its U.S. offices .
